topics.learning_outcomes: Distinguish groups of things according to their characteristics. Care for natural resources using ways such as recovering, reducing, reusing... Use whole numbers in variety of ways in daily life. Explore physical features of natural and man made environments. Classify Plants and Animals according to their characteristics.

subtopics: Water borne and Food borne Diseases
topics.learning_outcomes: Relate external structures of the human body to their functions. Measure using a variety of units. Practise hygiene. Practise hygiene to prevent Water borne and foodborne diseases.
Use measures of time in everyday life. Apply adaptation measures to weather changes.

Explore different materials in the environment. Explore sources of energy using different materials. Make shapes using different materials according to criteria. Use safe and clean water. Exhibit care for the surroundings.
Make mixtures. Use whole numbers in addition of things. Use whole numbers in subtraction things. Manage domestic waste.
